trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another designer, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragEnter%2A> for that designer is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果滑鼠進入其他設計工具，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragEnter%2A>會引發該設計工具。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same designer, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果滑鼠移動，但是待在相同的設計工具內便<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>就會引發事件。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the Action property of the event <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: -如果沒有鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A>就會引發事件，並決定是否要繼續拖曳、 置放資料，或取消作業根據事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>的 Action 屬性的值</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為`DragAction.Continue`、<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>就會引發事件，以繼續作業而<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>具有新效果就會引發事件，以便設定適當的視覺化回應。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>列舉型別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is supplied with the most up to date feedback on the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>和<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>事件會經過配對，如此在滑鼠移動經過置放目標，提供使用者最新的滑鼠位置回應。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so that the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為`DragAction.Drop`，置放效果值傳回來源，如此來源應用程式可以執行適當作業，資料來源; 例如，則剪下資料如果作業是移動。

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為`DragAction.Cancel`、<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>就會引發事件。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse button is released when the pointer is in designer bounds.
trans-unit.target: 發生於指標位於設計工具界限內時，放開滑鼠按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: 以下描述與拖放作業相關的事件如何及何時會引發。

trans-unit.source: If the designer is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果此設計工具的有效置放目標，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>指定的拖放效果引發事件。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需拖放效果的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>列舉型別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: - Changes in the pointer position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: 會追蹤指標位置、 鍵盤狀態和滑鼠按鈕狀態變更。

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of the designer bounds, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果使用者移出設計工具界限內，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>就會引發事件。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another designer, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragEnter%2A> for that designer is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果滑鼠進入其他設計工具，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragEnter%2A>會引發該設計工具。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same designer, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果滑鼠移動，但是待在相同的設計工具內便<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>就會引發事件。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the Action property of the event <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: -如果沒有鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A>就會引發事件，並決定是否要繼續拖曳、 置放資料，或取消作業根據事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>的 Action 屬性的值</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為`DragAction.Continue`、<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>就會引發事件，以繼續作業而<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>具有新效果就會引發事件，以便設定適當的視覺化回應。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>列舉型別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is supplied with the most up to date feedback on the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>和<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>事件會經過配對，如此在滑鼠移動經過置放目標，提供使用者最新的滑鼠位置回應。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so that the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為`DragAction.Drop`，置放效果值傳回來源，如此來源應用程式可以執行適當作業，資料來源; 例如，則剪下資料如果作業是移動。

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為`DragAction.Cancel`、<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>就會引發事件。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: Draws the visual representation of the activity at design time.
trans-unit.target: 繪製活動的設計階段的視覺化表示。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the drag operation should continue.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否應該繼續拖曳作業。

trans-unit.target: 通知<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>當使用者以視覺方式調整在設計階段。

trans-unit.source: The method is only called if the activity designer is a child of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeFormActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: 如果活動設計工具是<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeFormActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeFormActivityDesigner>的子系，只會呼叫方法

trans-unit.source: `e` specifies the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges> and new bounds being used for the resized <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> when a user changes the scroll position.
trans-unit.target: 通知<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>當使用者變更捲軸位置。

trans-unit.source: OnScroll provide no default behavior.
trans-unit.target: OnScroll 提供任何預設行為。

trans-unit.source: You must override it in a class that derives from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> to provide processing logic when a scroll position changes.
trans-unit.target: 您必須從衍生類別中覆寫它<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>捲軸位置變更時，提供處理邏輯。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"></xref> on which the user changed position.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"> </xref>所在使用者變更位置。

trans-unit.source: The new scroll position value.
trans-unit.target: 新的捲軸位置值。

trans-unit.source: Displays the designer verbs associated with a smart tag at the specified point.
trans-unit.target: 顯示指定的點上智慧標籤相關聯的設計工具動詞。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> ，指定要顯示智慧標籤的位置。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> whether a smart tag should be displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: 通知<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>智慧標籤是否應該顯示或隱藏。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the smart tag should be displayed; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the smart tag should be hidden.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示應顯示智慧標籤。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>來表示，應該隱藏的智慧標籤。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer that the associated theme has changed.
trans-unit.target: 通知設計工具相關聯的主題已經變更。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent designer of the existing designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得現有設計工具的父設計工具。

trans-unit.source: You can use the ParentDesigner to move up the tree of nested <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> objects or to find the root designer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 ParentDesigner 的樹狀向上移動巢狀<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>物件，或尋找根目錄設計工具。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The parent designer of the existing designer.
trans-unit.target: 在現有的設計工具的父設計工具。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> is a root designer then the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> returned will be the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>; otherwise, the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> will be the parent <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>為根目錄設計工具則<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>會傳回<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>，否則<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>將成為父系<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the configuration errors associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: 重新整理與設計工具相關聯的組態錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Designer actions represent the possible configuration errors associated with a designer.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具動作表示與設計工具相關聯的可能組態錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Calling RefreshDesignerActions updates these errors with any recent changes.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 RefreshDesignerActions 任何最近的變更來更新這些錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the activity designer verbs associated with the designer by calling the status handler.
trans-unit.target: 重新整理與設計工具相關聯，藉由呼叫狀態處理常式的活動設計工具動詞。

trans-unit.source: Designer verbs are shown in context menus and menu bars.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具動詞可顯示在內容功能表和功能表列。

trans-unit.source: Calling RefreshDesignerVerbs will refresh the menus to show any recent changes.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 RefreshDesignerVerbs 會重新整理功能表，以顯示任何最近的變更。

trans-unit.source: Stores the view state of the designer into a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: 將設計工具的檢視狀態儲存到二進位資料流。

trans-unit.source: The view state is the accumulation of the values of designer properties.
trans-unit.target: 檢視狀態是設計工具屬性值的累積。

trans-unit.source: When the view state is saved to a stream, the designer values and settings can be restored using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.LoadViewState%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 當檢視狀態儲存到資料流時，設定與設計工具的值可以還原使用<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.LoadViewState%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.LoadViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter> into which the view state is stored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>到儲存檢視狀態。</xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>

trans-unit.source: Shows the specified info tip.
trans-unit.target: 顯示指定的資訊提示。

trans-unit.source: Use ShowInfoTip to show a rectangle of text that can be used to display extended information about the designer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 ShowInfoTip 顯示可以用來顯示設計工具相關的額外的資訊的文字的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the InfoTip.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示在 infotip 上的文字。

trans-unit.target: 包含的資訊提示標題的字串。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the info tip text to display.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要顯示的資訊提示文字。

trans-unit.source: Displays the specified tool tip in the specified rectangle location.
trans-unit.target: 顯示指定的工具提示中指定的矩形位置。

trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要顯示的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the activity should show a smart tag.

trans-unit.source: Use ShowSmartTag to determine whether to show a smart tag when an activity has focus in the designer.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the activity should show a SmartTag; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle where the smart tag should be displayed.

trans-unit.source: Restores the view state from a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: 從二進位資料流還原檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader> to load the view state from.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader>載入從檢視狀態。</xref:System.IO.BinaryReader>

trans-unit.source: Saves the view state to a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: 將檢視狀態儲存到二進位資料流。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter> to save the view state to.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>來儲存檢視狀態。</xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> that requested the activity designer be initialized.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> ，它會要求初始化活動設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> that requested the activity designer be initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> ，它會要求初始化活動設計工具。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified type is supported on the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出目前是否支援指定的型別<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: IsSupportedActivityType is called only if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> is a root designer.
trans-unit.target: 只有當才會呼叫 IsSupportedActivityType<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>為根目錄設計工具。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the activity to check for support on the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>要檢查是否支援活動設計工具上的活動。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the type is supported on the current workflow designer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果目前的工作流程設計工具; 支援的類型否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets any message filters associated with the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得與活動設計工具相關聯的任何訊息篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref> read-only collection that contains any message filters associated with the workflow root designer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"> </xref>與工作流程根目錄設計工具相關聯的唯讀集合，其中包含任何訊息篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that indicates whether the actual workflow root designer supports the layout persistence.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出實際工作流程根目錄設計工具是否支援配置保存。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer supports layout persistence; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果設計工具支援配置保存。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to associate with the designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與設計工具相關聯的文字。

trans-unit.source: Use to associate a text string with the designer.
trans-unit.target: 使用與設計工具關聯的文字字串。

trans-unit.source: The text to associate with the designer.
trans-unit.target: 與設計工具相關聯的文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the text rectangle in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 取得值的文字矩形的邏輯座標。

trans-unit.source: Use to determine the location on the designer where <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Text%2A> will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 用於判斷設計工具上的位置其中<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Text%2A>隨即出現。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that contains the text associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，其中包含與設計工具相關聯的文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of verbs to be associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得要與設計工具相關聯的動詞集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the Verbs method to determine the verbs to show on the Context Menu.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Verbs 方法來判斷要在內容功能表上顯示的動詞。

trans-unit.source: The collection of verbs to be associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: 要與設計工具相關聯的動詞集合。
